message.entry: The puncture pattern must be a row or column vector
Puncture pattern must have length N-K
The puncture pattern must be binary.
The Puncture pattern should have less than 2*T zeros.
The puncture pattern has exactly 2*T zeros, the code will not be able to correct any errors.
The values for N and K do not produce a valid narrow-sense BCH code
K - ShortenedLength must be greater than 0.
